mapper.select: SELECT password FROM article WHERE article_id = #{article_id} AND status = 1

SELECT a.id, a.uuid, a.article_id, a.article_name, a.article_cover, a.excerpt, a.article_content, a.page_views, a.like_count, a.favorite_count, a.password, GROUP_CONCAT(atr.article_tag) as tag, a.category, a.alias, a.create_time, a.status FROM article a LEFT JOIN article_tag_relation atr ON a.article_id = atr.article_id WHERE a.article_id = #{article_id} AND a.status = 1 GROUP BY a.id, a.uuid, a.article_id, a.article_name, a.article_cover, a.excerpt, a.article_content, a.page_views, a.like_count, a.favorite_count, a.password, a.category, a.alias, a.create_time, a.status

SELECT a.id, a.uuid, a.article_id, a.article_name, a.article_cover, a.excerpt, a.article_content, a.page_views, a.like_count, a.favorite_count, a.password, GROUP_CONCAT(atr.article_tag) as tag, a.category, a.alias, a.create_time, a.status FROM article a LEFT JOIN article_tag_relation atr ON a.article_id = atr.article_id WHERE a.alias = #{alias} AND a.status = 1 GROUP BY a.id, a.uuid, a.article_id, a.article_name, a.article_cover, a.excerpt, a.article_content, a.page_views, a.like_count, a.favorite_count, a.password, a.category, a.alias, a.create_time, a.status
SELECT CASE WHEN password IS NOT NULL AND password != '' THEN true ELSE false END FROM article WHERE alias = #{alias} AND status = 1
